title: Entertainment Style

questions.text: For a movie night together, I'd love us to...
choices: Pick something new neither of us has seen
Revisit a favorite one of us wants to share
Take turns choosing - your pick this time, mine next
Find something we're both in the mood for in the moment

questions.text: When we can't agree on what to watch, I hope we...
choices: Flip a coin and go with it
Each pitch our top choice and find common ground
Save both options and watch one now, one later
Put on something easy we both kind of like

questions.text: When it comes to music together, I'd enjoy...
choices: Sharing songs we've discovered and making playlists for each other
Having our music playing when we're together
Enjoying music separately - it's a personal thing
Going to concerts or live music together

questions.text: If we had a game night (just us or with friends), I'd want to...
choices: Get competitive - I like winning!
Play as a team against others or the game
Keep it light and silly with party games
Try something new we've never played

questions.text: For a lazy evening at home together, I picture us...
choices: Doing our own things in the same room - cozy parallel time
Watching something together, cuddled up
Playing a game or doing an activity together
Talking, cooking, or just hanging out without screens

description: Discover how you like to unwind and have fun together.
